channel.title: Give Me your Tutorials!
channel.description:
Ok guys i have my blog up and running and id love if you guys could share them with me!!
Example [url=http://www.welshys-world.pwnds.info]Here[/url]
Reasons why?
1. All Credits to you
2. advertising of your site on the tut!
3. featured on tutorial sites!
4. Cos im a good guy :P
So pm me in this format!
*Title of Tutorial
* Name
* website
* Tutorial Link
Thanks guys!

item.title: Give Me your Tutorials!
item.dc:creator: @MybBob MybBob
item.description:
@MybBob wrote:

[quote=“welshy, post:4, topic:131339”][quote author=exps35 link=topic=182038.msg1661187#msg1661187 date=1186619184]
This is the same topic that Mr. Chris posted about 5 days before he shut his site down

If I ever make a tut, I’ll be sure to keep your site in mind.
[/quote] Ya but mines a blog so its not going anywhere :D[/quote]

The only site of Mr.Chris’s that was going anywhere was Elite-Gfx.

Read full topic
